javascript:!function(){var e={};e.copyToClipboard=void 0,e.copyToClipboard=function(e,t){if(!t)return!1;var o=t.createElement("div"),n=t.createElement("textarea"),i=t.createElement("input"),l=t.createElement("input");o.appendChild(n),o.appendChild(i),o.appendChild(l),o.setAttribute("style",["width:100%","border:1px solid silver","padding:5px","position:absolute","background:black","z-index:9999"].join(";")),n.value=e,n.setAttribute("rows","1"),n.setAttribute("style",["width:50%","overflow:hidden","resize:none","float:left"].join(";")),i.type="button",i.value="Copy",i.onclick=function(){n.select(),n.setSelectionRange(0,99999),t.execCommand("copy"),t.body.removeChild(o)},l.type="button",l.value="Cancel",l.onclick=function(){t.body.removeChild(o)};var d=t.body.firstChild;return t.body.insertBefore(o,d),o.scrollIntoView(),!0};e.copyToClipboard(document.title+"\n"+document.location.href,document)}();
